message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I think $80 would be a fair price for me to purchase it.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that you think $80 is a fair price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. It's a great product, and I think it's worth a bit more than that. Let me know if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I believe $80 remains a fair price for me to purchase it.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're sticking to your initial offer of $80, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll offer it to you for $82.50. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
